Class SocketClientConnectionStub defines a stub for SocketClientConnection class.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    SocketClientConnectionStub​(java.net.Socket socket, Server server)
    Constructor of the class: it instantiates an input/output stream from the socket received as parameters, and add the main server to his attributes too.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void close()
    Method close terminates the connection with the client, closing firstly input and output streams, then invoking the server method called "unregisterClient", which will remove the active virtual client from the list.

    Methods inherited from class it.polimi.ingsw.server.SocketClientConnection

    actionHandler, actionHandler, getClientID, getSocket, isActive, readFromStream, run, sendSocketMessage, setPlayers

  • Constructor Details

    • SocketClientConnectionStub

      public SocketClientConnectionStub​(java.net.Socket socket, Server server)
      Constructor of the class: it instantiates an input/output stream from the socket received as parameters, and add the main server to his attributes too.
      Parameters:
      socket - the socket which accepted the client connection.
      server - the main server class.

  • Method Details

    • close

      public void close()
      Method close terminates the connection with the client, closing firstly input and output streams, then invoking the server method called "unregisterClient", which will remove the active virtual client from the list.
      Overrides:
      close in class SocketClientConnection
      See Also:
      for more details., SocketClientConnection.close()
